author: mark1961London
title: Nice few days away
text:
This hotel is a nice place to stay close to termini main train station if arriving by train or transfer bus from the the airport. The hotel itself is very clean and all staff are friendly and helpful checking was very quick. The room we had was very clean and tidy with a nice size bedroom and bathroom there is air conditioning ( not tested) in the room and the cleaner came in and tided up very morning there is a safe in the room which was easy to use and a tv if needed. Breakfast was ok cereal, and some cooked food (eggs bacon small sausage) there is also fruit and pastries.also as a roof top bar open until 1 Outside the hotel there are a lot of restaurants to choose from. The colosseum is 15 min walk and 25 min to Trevi fountain and Spanish step and if you can walk 1.40 min to Vatican but on the way there are good historical sites
Room Tip: Maybe get a room at the back of the hotel in the summer on busy road See more room tips
